article_title: Tesla: Still A Strong Buy (On Pullbacks)

article_title: Rivian (RIVN): Assessing Valuation After Strong Q3 Results and Reinforced Growth Guidance
raw_text: { "summary": "Rivian reported strong Q3 results, achieving its first positive gross profit and beating revenue expectations. Management reaffirmed 2025 production and delivery guidance, and the stock has gained momentum with a 19% 1-month and ~15% YTD share price increase.", "sentiment": "Positive — Strong Q3 execution, first positive gross profit, reaffirmed guidance, and share price momentum indicate improving fundamentals and investor confidence.", "watch": "Monitor sustainability of gross margin improvement, execution against 2025 production/delivery targets, and any updates on demand, pricing, and cash burn trajectory." }

article_title: Rivian 'copies' rival Tesla with $4.6 billion move
